---
title: "zri_sfr_texas"
author: "Rachel Landers"
date: "9/22/2019"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
zri_sfr <- readxl::read_excel(here::here("data", "prepped", "zri_sfr_state.xlsx"))
```
```{r}
summary(zri_sfr)
```
```{r}
tail(zri_sfr)
```
```{r}
zri_sfr_tx <- zri_sfr %>% 
  subset(RegionName == "texas")
tail(zri_sfr_tx)
```
```{r}
summary(zri_sfr_tx)
```

```{r}
ggplot(zri_sfr_tx, aes(date, zri)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, 
                                   hjust = 0, 
                                   vjust = 0))
```
```{r}
ggplot(zri_sfr_tx, aes(month, zri)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "summary", fun.y = "mean")
```
```{r}
ggplot(zri_sfr_tx, aes(year, zri)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "summary", fun.y = "mean")
```
```{r}
ggplot(zri_sfr_tx, aes(zri)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 100)
```
